document_name_accent: viem bao hoat dich khop hang.json
subsection_content:
If there is early intervention, hip bursitis can often be cured and is not dangerous. On the contrary, some complications may appear in cases of delayed treatment such as: (3)
Muscle weakness.; Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.; Disability, paralysis; Increased risk of bone and joint diseases such as hip osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, hip arthritis, synovial cysts...
subsection_title: viem bao hoat dich khop hang.json. Symptoms

If there is early intervention, hip bursitis can often be cured and is not dangerous. On the contrary, some complications may appear in cases of delayed treatment such as: (3)
Muscle weakness.; Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.; Disability, paralysis; Increased risk of bone and joint diseases such as hip osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, hip arthritis, synovial cysts...
